text: Její pastorkyně is a 1938 Czechoslovak film directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Marie Ptáková, Leopolda Dostalová, and Jiří Dohnal, and is based on a play by Gabriela Preissová. ==References== ==External links== *Její pastorkyně at the Internet Movie Database Category:1938 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films based on plays Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak drama films Category:1938 drama films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: Její pastorkyně
